name: Meme Air Hockey
description:
All your favorite memes in one place, on a board, fighting for the title of "THE DANKEST" !!!
Play solo or with a friend, featuring local multiplayer and 3 difficulty modes versus AI.
You can customize your Player Pads, Pucks and Boards, there are themes for everyone, you can even combine them!
FEATURES:
- 2 player mode (on the same device).
- TONS of paddle, pucks and board themes that can be combined.
- 3 main menu themes (Basic, Halloween, Christmas).
- Single player mode with 3 difficulty levels.
